text: Yaqeenan hum ney aap ki taraf issi tarah wahee ki hai jaisay kay nooh (alh-e-salam) aur inn kay baad walay nabiyon ki taraf ki aur hum ney wahee ki ibrahim aur isamail aur ishaq aur yaqoob aur unn ki aulad per aur essa aur ayub aur younus aur haroon aur suleman ki taraf. Aur hum ney dawood (alh-e-salam) ko zaboor ata farmaee
